text: Truro (Mi'kmaq: Wagobagitik) is a town in central Nova Scotia, Canada. ==References== * == Other websites == * Town of Truro (official website) * TruroNS.com (Your Truro information website) * Central Nova Tourist Association (official website) * Downtown Truro Partnership * Truro Daily News Category:Towns in Nova Scotia
title: Truro, Nova Scotia
